name: cerium oxide to generic market for mischmetal | mischmetal | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23853/documentation

This activity links cerium oxide to the generic market mischmetal.

Activity starts with the reception of 'cerium oxide'.

Activity ends with the 'mischmetal' being ready for transportation.
